title: Beautiful Italic Face
content:
I saw this beutiful italc face. I have two questions:

\*Who designed it

\*it is a custom or Commercial?

author: dhannah1000

comments.content: Looks like a Baskerville...but the slant of the italic is too much. Will keep looking
It certainly doesn't look like Adobe Garamond. Where is the sample from?
